Hi all,

I did further tests using JUnit 4 and RetroWeaver to see, whether backward
compatibility can be achieved.
RetroWeaver 2.0Beta1 seems to have bugs when running JUnit 4 test suite
against weaved JUnit using JDK 1.4.

See also
	http://junitext.sourceforge.net/backward-compatibility.html

and  RetroWeaver bug posted
	https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=637380&aid=1562317&group_
id=104240

Any progress will be posted here.

Bye, Jochen Hiller
